dialogue.text: ok, the only thing you could face here besides disease is a Smiler..
My Name is PartyPooper#58, The Partygoers are killing my kind. I need your help to stop them!
You will meet them soon, but for now we have more oppressing matters to take care of, I can track a Smiler in the distance.
Smilers are a menance if you hear 'SH' You have to click space to avoid the bite... Stay safe!
